text: Toto bamala okhukhaya balia baboola mbu: “Toto Nyasaye ni omubashe Isah Omwana wa Mariam,” Boola mbu; “niwina uliba nende shiosi shiosi imbeli wa Nyasaye niyenya okhusishia Omubashe Omwana wa Mariam nende nyinamwana nende biosi bili khushialo?” Ne obwami bwomwikulu nende khushialo nende ebili hakari wabio , nibwa Nyasaye, aloonganga shiayenya, ne Nyasaye ni omunyali wa bulu eshindu
